concept.title: Static Implementation
concept.shortdesc: The static implementation links AppMeasurement_Media_AutoTrackOSMF.swc into your Flash project before compiling it for use.

conbody.p: AppMeasurement_Media_AutoTrackOSMF.swc includes the bridge class AutoTrackOSMF.

For example, once you have linked both AppMeasurement and the AppMeasurement plug-in for OSMF into the Flash project that includes an OSMF player with a MediaFactory, the tracking code implementation might look like the following:
The highlighted code performs the linking of AppMeasurement to the OSMF player, including:

ol.li: Import the AppMeasurement plug-in for OSMF class
Add the auto-track support for OSMF to an instance of AppMeasurement
Loading the reference plug-in into the OSMF MediaFactory.
